item.title: 恒大清算听证会推迟至1月 聚焦新债务重组计划
item.description:
China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) on Monday said it has been granted an adjournment of a court hearing into a liquidation petition to Jan. 29, giving the embattled property developer time to finalise a revamped offshore debt-restructuring plan.翻译:中国恒大集团（3333.HK）周一表示，已获准将清算申请的法庭听证会推迟至 1 月 29 日，这让这家陷入困境的房地产开发商有时间敲定修改后的海外债务重组计划。

The decision came as the world's most indebted developer with more than $300 billion in liabilities sought adjournment unexpectedly unopposed by the petitioner's lawyer.翻译:这一决定是在全球负债超过 3000 亿美元的开发商寻求延期审理之际做出的，出人意料的是，申请人的律师并未提出反对。

On Oct. 29, at the previous adjournment, Hong Kong High Court Justice Linda Chan said Monday's hearing would be the last before a decision was made whether to liquidate Evergrande in the absence of a "concrete" restructuring plan.翻译:10月29日，香港高等法院法官陈嘉欣在上一次休庭中表示，周一的听证会将是在没有“具体”重组计划的情况下决定是否清算恒大之前的最后一次听证会。

After Monday's adjournment, Evergrande stock reversed losses from earlier in the day to jump more than 13%.翻译:周一休会后，恒大股价扭转当天早些时候的跌幅，涨幅超过 13%。

Evergrande defaulted on offshore debt in late 2021, becoming the poster child of a debt crisis that has engulfed China's property sector. Last week, it scrambled to revise its restructuring plan to avoid liquidation, Reuters has reported.翻译:恒大集团于2021年底出现境外债务违约，成为席卷中国房地产行业的债务危机的典型代表。据路透社报道，上周，该公司紧急修改重组计划以避免清算。

Evergrande "somewhat surprisingly has obtained some further time to rethink its plans," said partner Neil McDonald of Kirkland & Ellis, a legal adviser to an ad hoc group of offshore creditors opposed to the revised terms.翻译:凯易律师事务所合伙人尼尔·麦克唐纳（Neil McDonald）表示，恒大“有点令人惊讶的是，它获得了更多时间来重新考虑其计划”。他是反对修订条款的海外债权人特别小组的法律顾问。

Still, Evergrande is likely to be wound up at the next hearing if it does not come up with a plan accepted by all classes of creditors, he said.

SURPRISE

Hong Kong-based investment firm Top Shine filed the petition in June 2022 saying Evergrande had not honoured an agreement to repurchase shares it bought in the developer's Fangchebao unit.翻译:总部位于香港的投资公司Top Shine于2022年6月提交请愿书，称恒大没有履行回购其在开发商房车宝子公司购买的股份的协议。

The petitioner surprised the court on Monday when its lawyer started proceedings saying he was "instructed not to present any argument in opposition to" adjournment.翻译:周一，请愿人的律师在启动诉讼程序时表示，请愿人“被指示不要提出任何反对休庭的论点”，这令法庭感到惊讶。

Justice Chan ordered the petitioner inform other creditors a week ahead of the next hearing should it decide to withdraw the petition, so those creditors can continue action if they wish.翻译:陈法官命令，如果请愿人决定撤回请愿书，请在下次听证会前一周告知其他债权人，以便这些债权人可以根据需要继续采取行动。

"We'll see what happens with the company before the 29th but if nothing changes, then yes," said McDonald when asked by reporters whether the creditors Kirkland represents will file to liquidate Evergrande if the petitioner withdraws.翻译:当被记者问及柯克兰代表的债权人如果申请者撤回是否会申请清算恒大时，麦克唐纳表示：“我们将在29日之前看看该公司会发生什么，但如果没有任何变化，那就是的。”

"It (today's lack of opposition) is not an indication that we will not proceed with the liquidation petition," a representative of Top Shine told Reuters after the hearing.翻译:Top Shine 的一名代表在听证会后对路透社表示：“（今天没有反对）并不表明我们不会继续进行清算申请。”

Evergrande's lawyer told the court the developer expects to "refine" its restructuring proposal in the next five weeks.翻译:恒大的律师告诉法庭，开发商预计将在未来五周内“完善”其重组方案。

Under revised terms, the lawyer said Evergrande is offering shares to creditors - 17.8% of China Evergrande Group, 21.6% of Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) and 28.5% of Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group (0708.HK).翻译:该律师表示，根据修订后的条款，恒大将向债权人发行股份——中国恒大集团17.8%的股份、恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK） 21.6%的股份以及恒大新能源汽车集团（0708.HK） 28.5%的股份。

It will also offer certificates, or the right to proceeds from disposable assets. Those terms replace its proposal to issue equity-linked instruments backed by the three listed companies and new bonds in March.翻译:它还将提供证书，或从可支配资产中获得收益的权利。这些条款取代了三月份发行由三家上市公司支持的股票挂钩工具和新债券的提议。

The ratio of shares is different for so-called Class A and Class C creditors, as is the list of assets that can raise funds, the lawyer said.翻译:该律师表示，所谓的A类和C类债权人的股份比例不同，可筹集资金的资产清单也不同。

Justice Chan said Evergrande must hold direct discussion with relevant Chinese authorities on the new restructuring terms, and that the plan needs support from all creditor classes by the next hearing.翻译:陈法官表示，恒大必须与中国有关部门就新的重组条款进行直接讨论，并且该计划需要在下次听证会上获得所有债权人的支持。

Evergrande failed to get the 75% approval required from Class C creditors for original terms proposed in March, Reuters has reported.翻译:据路透社报道，恒大未能获得 C 级债权人 3 月份提出的原始条款所需的 75% 批准。

Managing Director Bert Grisel of investment bank Moelis & Co - advising the same creditor group - said after the hearing the group "firmly" rejects the revised plan because creditors would be entitled to less than through liquidation.翻译:为同一债权人集团提供咨询服务的投资银行 Moelis & Co 的董事总经理伯特·格里塞尔 (Bert Grisel) 在听证会后表示，该集团“坚决”拒绝修改后的计划，因为债权人将有权通过清算获得更少的资金。

"Liquidation does little good to creditors, but it is extremely difficult to get a debt repayment plan that satisfies everyone - that is why we have a deadlock with Evergrande here," said ANZ Bank China credit analyst Ting Meng.

UNFINISHED HOMES

Liquidation of Evergrande, whose assets totalled $240 billion at June-end, would increase pressure on a reeling property sector, which accounts for a quarter of the world's second-largest economy.翻译:截至6月底资产总额达2400亿美元的恒大集团的清算将给摇摇欲坠的房地产行业带来更大的压力，该行业占世界第二大经济体的四分之一。

Its debt woes have been a major concern for global investors at a time when government stimulus has struggled to propel post-pandemic economic recovery, with property sales slowing and hundreds of thousands of homes left unfinished.翻译:在政府刺激措施难以推动疫情后的经济复苏、房地产销售放缓、数十万套房屋未完工之际，其债务困境一直是全球投资者的主要担忧。

Evergrande has been working on a debt revamp plan for almost two years. Its original plan was scuppered in late September when it said its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was under investigation for suspected crimes.翻译:恒大近两年来一直致力于债务重组计划。 9月底，该公司表示其亿万富翁创始人许家印因涉嫌犯罪而接受调查，原定计划因此流产。

At the time, the developer also said regulators denied approval to issue new U.S. dollar bonds - a crucial part of the restructuring plan - as its flagship onshore unit was also under investigation.翻译:当时，该开发商还表示，监管机构拒绝批准发行新的美元债券——这是重组计划的重要组成部分——因为其旗舰陆上子公司也正在接受调查。

Reporting by Clare Jim and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Writing by Sumeet Chatterjee; Editing by Kim Coghill, Christopher Cushing and Louise Heavens翻译:Clare Jim 和 Xie Yu 在香港的报道；苏米特·查特吉 (Sumeet Chatterjee) 撰写；编辑：Kim Coghill、Christopher Cushing 和 Louise Heavens

item.title: 沉默两年后，著名香港活动人士移居加拿大
item.description:
One of Hong Kong's most prominent pro-democracy activists, who was jailed as part of a China-imposed security crackdown, said on Sunday she had left Hong Kong for Canada after pressure from authorities left her with mental health issues.翻译:香港最著名的民主活动人士之一在中国实施的安全镇压中被监禁，她周日表示，在当局的压力下，她出现了心理健康问题，因此她已离开香港前往加拿大。

Agnes Chow, 27 - a core member of a now-disbanded group of younger activists, including Joshua Wong, who helped drive Hong Kong's pro-democracy movement - said on her Instagram account late on Sunday that she had left Hong Kong for studies in Canada.翻译:27 岁的周庭是一个现已解散的年轻活动人士团体的核心成员，其中包括帮助推动香港民主运动的黄之锋。周日晚些时候，她在 Instagram 帐户上表示，她已离开香港前往加拿大学习。

Their group, Demosisto, dissolved hours after Beijing passed a sweeping national security law in 2020.翻译:他们的团体众志 (Demosisto) 在北京于 2020 年通过一项全面的国家安全法数小时后解散。

The law has stifled the pro-democracy movement and led to more than 280 arrests, drawing criticism from some Western governments that the legislation is a tool of repression.翻译:该法律扼杀了民主运动，并导致 280 多人被捕，招致一些西方政府的批评，称该立法是镇压工具。

Beijing says the law has brought stability to Hong Kong after mass pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:北京表示，在 2019 年大规模民主抗议活动之后，该法律为香港带来了稳定。

Chow's posts - her first public comments since her release from prison in June 2021 - detailed how she had remained under "supervision" from the authorities.翻译:周的帖子是她自 2021 年 6 月出狱以来的首次公开评论，详细说明了她如何继续受到当局的“监督”。

Chow was sentenced to 10 months in jail in Nov 2020 over an unauthorised assembly charge. She was later released on bail on the condition she check in with police regularly, and her passport was confiscated as she faced an alleged national security charge, along with others including pro-democracy businessman Jimmy Lai.翻译:2020 年 11 月，周因未经授权集会罪被判处10 个月监禁。她后来被保释，条件是定期向警方报到，她的护照因面临所谓的国家安全指控而被没收，其他人包括亲民主商人黎智英。

Chow said it was as if the police wanted to remind her that she hadn't regained her freedom, and to "not try to do anything". She said the pressures led her to be diagnosed with depression and post-traumatic stress disorder.翻译:周说，警方似乎想提醒她，她还没有重获自由，并且“不要尝试做任何事情”。她说，压力导致她被诊断出患有抑郁症和创伤后应激障碍。

"Several emotional illnesses put my body and mind in a very unstable state," added Chow.翻译:“几种情绪疾病让我的身心处于非常不稳定的状态，”周补充道。

Reuters could not reach Chow, who arrived in Canada in September, for comment.翻译:路透社无法联系到九月份抵达加拿大的周请其置评。

Hong Kong police in a statement on Monday condemned Chow's "irresponsible behaviours that blatantly challenge law and order" and urged her not to be a fugitive for the rest of her life.翻译:香港警方周一在一份声明中谴责周女士“公然挑战法律和秩序的不负责任行为”，并敦促她余生不要成为逃犯。

Chow said it was only this year, after she was accepted by a university in Toronto, that the police agreed to return her passport if she travelled to the Chinese city of Shenzhen.翻译:周说，直到今年，在她被多伦多一所大学录取后，警方才同意在她前往中国深圳时归还她的护照。

The trip included visits to Chinese tech major Tencent and a "patriotic" exhibition on China's achievements.翻译:此行包括参观中国科技巨头腾讯以及展示中国成就的“爱国”展览。

"I was forced to go to mainland China in exchange for the opportunity to study abroad," she wrote.翻译:“我被迫去中国大陆，以换取出国留学的机会，”她写道。

Chow was due to report to Hong Kong's security police this month but decided not to return out of consideration for her personal safety and well being. "Maybe I won't return for the rest of my life," she wrote.翻译:周原定于本月向香港保安警察报到，但出于个人安全和健康考虑，决定不再返回。 “也许我这辈子都不会再回来了，”她写道。

item.title: 西方初创企业寻求打破中国对稀土精炼的控制
item.description:
Start-up tech firms are racing to transform the way rare earths are refined for the clean energy transition, a push aimed at turbocharging the West's expansion into the niche sector that underpins billions of electronic devices.翻译:初创科技公司正在竞相改变稀土精炼方式，以实现清洁能源转型，此举旨在加速西方向支撑数十亿电子设备的利基行业的扩张。

The existing standard to refine these strategic minerals, known as solvent extraction, is an expensive and dirty process that China has spent the past 30 years mastering. MP Materials (MP.N), Lynas Rare Earths (LYC.AX) and other Western rare earths companies have struggled at times to deploy it due to technical complexities and pollution concerns.翻译:提炼这些战略矿物的现有标准，即溶剂萃取，是一个昂贵且肮脏的过程，中国在过去 30 年里一直在掌握。由于技术复杂性和污染问题， MP Materials (MP.N) 、莱纳斯稀土公司(LYC.AX)和其他西方稀土公司有时很难部署它。

Rare earths are a group of 17 metals used to make magnets that turn power into motion for electric vehicles, cell phones and other electronics. While U.S. scientists helped develop solvent extraction for rare earths in the 1950s, radioactive waste from the process gradually made it unpopular in the United States.翻译:稀土是一组 17 种金属，用于制造磁铁，将电力转化为电动汽车、手机和其他电子产品的运动。虽然美国科学家在 20 世纪 50 年代帮助开发了稀土溶剂萃取法，但该过程中产生的放射性废物逐渐使其在美国不再受欢迎。

China began to rapidly expand in the industry starting during the 1980s and now controls 87% of global rare earths refining capacity, according to the International Energy Agency. That prowess has helped propel the country's economy to the second-largest in the world.翻译:据国际能源署称，中国从 20 世纪 80 年代开始在该行业迅速扩张，目前控制着全球稀土精炼能力的 87%。这种实力帮助该国经济跃升为世界第二大经济体。

Emerging Western rivals now offer the tantalizing prospect of processing the minerals in faster, cleaner and cheaper ways, if they can successfully launch.翻译:如果新兴的西方竞争对手能够成功推出的话，他们现在将提供以更快、更清洁和更便宜的方式加工矿物的诱人前景。

"The existing rare earths refining process is a nightmare," said Isabel Barton, a mining and geological engineering professor at the University of Arizona. "That's why there are so many companies promising new methods, because we need new ones."翻译:“现有的稀土精炼工艺是一场噩梦，”亚利桑那大学采矿和地质工程教授伊莎贝尔·巴顿说。 “这就是为什么有这么多公司承诺新方法，因为我们需要新方法。”

Interviews with nearly two dozen industry consultants, academics and executives show that if one or more of these novel processing technologies succeed as hoped by 2025, they could slash reliance on Chinese rare earths technology and its toxic by-products while also bolstering plans by Western firms to charge premium prices for the strategic minerals.翻译:对近二十位行业顾问、学者和高管的采访表明，如果这些新颖的加工技术中的一种或多种在 2025 年之前取得成功，它们可以减少对中国稀土技术及其有毒副产品的依赖，同时也支持西方公司的计划对战略矿产收取溢价。

While none have launched commercially - and some industry consultants and analysts question whether they will be able to do so soon - a cadre of firms are pushing forward with aggressive development plans.翻译:虽然还没有一家公司推出商业化——而且一些行业顾问和分析师质疑他们是否能够很快这样做——但一批公司正在推进积极的开发计划。

On a former U.S. Air Force base in Louisiana, Ucore Rare Metals (UCU.V) aims to process rare earths by mid-2025 using a technology known as RapidSX that it says is at least three times faster than solvent extraction, produces no hazardous chemical waste and requires only a third of the physical space.翻译:在路易斯安那州的前美国空军基地，Ucore Rare Metals (UCU.V)的目标是到 2025 年中期使用名为 RapidSX 的技术加工稀土，据称该技术比溶剂萃取速度至少快三倍，且不产生危险化学品浪费，只需要三分之一的物理空间。

"Our goal is to re-establish a North American rare earths supply chain," Michael Schrider, Ucore's chief operating officer, said during a visit to the site.翻译:Ucore 首席运营官 Michael Schrider 在参观该工厂时表示：“我们的目标是重建北美稀土供应链。”

Formed in 2006, Ucore initially planned to mine a rare earths deposit in Alaska. But the company changed tack in 2022 to focus on refining, not mining, a pivot born from what two executives said they saw as a flaw in the West's strategy to weaken China's minerals dominance by trying to master both steps simultaneously.翻译:Ucore 成立于 2006 年，最初计划开采阿拉斯加的稀土矿床。但该公司在 2022 年改变了策略，将重点放在炼油上，而不是采矿上，这一重心源于两位高管表示，他们认为西方试图同时掌握这两个步骤来削弱中国矿产主导地位的战略存在缺陷。

Ucore, which has been testing its process with Pentagon funding, is in talks now with 17 mining companies to buy lightly processed supplies of rare earths known as concentrate, ship them to the Port of New Orleans, then truck them to a 80,800-square foot warehouse that will be outfitted with the RapidSX technology beginning in January.翻译:Ucore 一直在五角大楼的资助下测试其工艺，目前正在与 17 家矿业公司进行谈判，购买轻加工的稀土（称为精矿）供应，将其运至新奥尔良港，然后用卡车运至 80,800 平方英尺的工厂。该仓库将从一月份开始配备 RapidSX 技术。

Rare earths miners increasingly say they are content to focus on digging up rock - rather than compounding their operations with the added step of processing.翻译:越来越多的稀土矿商表示，他们满足于专注于开采岩石，而不是将其业务与额外的加工步骤相结合。

"Mining companies should focus on finding new deposits," said Luisa Moreno, president of Defense Metals (DEFN.V), which aims to open a rare earths mine in British Columbia within four years and is interested in licensing Ucore's technology. "You probably should let refining be handled by others that specialize in that."翻译:国防金属公司(DEFN.V)总裁路易莎·莫雷诺 (Luisa Moreno) 表示：“矿业公司应专注于寻找新矿床。”该公司的目标是四年内在不列颠哥伦比亚省开设一座稀土矿，并有兴趣获得 Ucore 技术的许可。 “你可能应该让其他专门从事精炼工作的人来处理。”

Rainbow Rare Earths (RBWR.L) plans by 2026 to deploy rare earths refining technology in South Africa developed by its Florida-based partner K-Technologies that uses a process known as continuous ion exchange, used by some lithium producers.翻译:Rainbow Rare Earths (RBWR.L)计划到 2026 年在南非部署由其位于佛罗里达州的合作伙伴 K-Technologies 开发的稀土精炼技术，该技术采用了一些锂生产商使用的称为连续离子交换的工艺。

Startup Aether is developing nanotechnology that programs proteins to selectively bind with and extract rare earths from ore deposits.翻译:初创公司 Aether 正在开发纳米技术，对蛋白质进行编程，使其选择性地与矿床结合并提取稀土。

In Norway, privately-held REETec says its proprietary refining process emits 90% less carbon dioxide than solvent extraction and should be operational by late 2024.翻译:在挪威，私营 REETec 表示，其专有精炼工艺的二氧化碳排放量比溶剂萃取法少 90%，预计将于 2024 年底投入运营。

And privately-held Phoenix Tailings earlier this year began refining small amounts of rare earths in Massachusetts using a process that it says is free of emissions and waste.翻译:今年早些时候，私人控股的 Phoenix Tailings 开始在马萨诸塞州使用一种据称没有排放和废物的工艺精炼少量稀土。

"There are technologies that can be developed that are far better than solvent extraction," said Robert Fox, a scientist at the U.S. Department of Energy's Idaho National Laboratory. The lab last month agreed to research new refining techniques for privately-held U.S. Critical Materials, which is developing a Wyoming rare earths deposit.

SKEPTICISM

Despite the hunger for new refining techniques, industry consultants warned that manufacturers may be expecting too much and too soon from this so-far unproven group of nascent technologies, especially given the world's aggressive electrification targets.翻译:尽管渴望新的炼油技术，但行业顾问警告说，制造商可能对这组迄今为止未经证实的新兴技术期望过高且过早，特别是考虑到世界雄心勃勃的电气化目标。

Ucore's technology, for example, has never worked at commercial scale and is not expected to gain patent protection until next year, a timeline that industry consultants flagged as a cause for concern given strong rivalries for intellectual property.翻译:例如，Ucore 的技术从未在商业规模上发挥过作用，预计要到明年才能获得专利保护，鉴于知识产权竞争激烈，行业顾问将这一时间表标记为令人担忧的原因。

"The time horizon needed to develop all these new refining technologies will be longer than many expect," said Frank Fannon, a minerals industry consultant and former U.S. assistant secretary of state. Talks of production within a few years "creates a false sense of security for policymakers."翻译:矿产行业顾问、美国前助理国务卿弗兰克·范农 (Frank Fannon) 表示：“开发所有这些新炼油技术所需的时间将比许多人预期的要长。”几年内的生产谈判“给政策制定者制造了一种错误的安全感”。

Yet the need for alternatives is rising, especially in the wake of Beijing's decision earlier this year to curb exports of germanium, graphite and other metals. That has sparked concerns that rare earths could be next.翻译:然而，对替代品的需求正在上升，特别是在北京今年早些时候决定限制锗、 石墨和其他金属的出口之后。这引发了人们对稀土可能成为下一个的担忧。

Fannon and several U.S. politicians have called for Western governments to create central rare earths processing hubs, a plan already being pursued by Canada.翻译:范农和几位美国政界人士呼吁西方政府建立中央稀土加工中心，加拿大已经在实施这一计划。

In Saskatchewan, government scientists are working to launch their own rare earths processing technology after attempts to buy Chinese technology sputtered in 2020.翻译:在萨斯喀彻温省，政府科学家在 2020 年试图购买中国技术失败后，正在努力推出自己的稀土加工技术。

"We looked at existing technologies and said, 'There's a better way of doing this,'" said Mike Crabtree, CEO of the Saskatchewan Research Council (SRC), which is funded by the provincial government. "We wanted to put our own spin on it."翻译:萨斯喀彻温省研究委员会 (SRC) 由省政府资助，其首席执行官迈克·克拉布特里 (Mike Crabtree) 表示：“我们研究了现有技术并表示，‘有更好的方法可以做到这一点。’” “我们想加入我们自己的想法。”

Using artificial intelligence, the company designed processing equipment it believes is more efficient than Chinese rivals. Rather than needing up to 100 people to run, as with traditional solvent extraction, the SRC estimates that only four people will be needed to run its plant, which it hopes to open by the end of 2024.翻译:该公司利用人工智能设计了其认为比中国竞争对手更高效的处理设备。 SRC 估计只需要 4 个人来运营其工厂，而不是像传统的溶剂萃取那样需要多达 100 人来运营，该工厂希望在 2024 年底前开业。

While the SRC's goal is to spur mining across Canada, Crabtree said he is open to licensing the technology for use anywhere in the world.翻译:虽然 SRC 的目标是刺激加拿大各地的采矿业，但 Crabtree 表示，他愿意授权该技术在世界任何地方使用。

"This entire sector as a whole needs to grow outside of China in order to support the energy transition," he said.翻译:他说：“整个行业需要在中国境外发展，以支持能源转型。”

Crabtree and the SRC expect their facility to cost more to build than Chinese rivals but less to operate, a function of their desire to make processing equipment that has no waste and recycles acid and other key chemicals.翻译:Crabtree 和 SRC 预计，他们的工厂建设成本比中国竞争对手更高，但运营成本更低，因为他们希望制造无废物并回收酸和其他关键化学品的加工设备。

And while MP Materials and others have struggled to tailor their processing equipment to specific geological deposits, SRC, Ucore and others say they believe their new refining processes will be able to process the critical minerals from multiple locations across the globe.翻译:尽管 MP Materials 和其他公司一直在努力根据特定的地质矿床定制加工设备，但 SRC、Ucore 和其他公司表示，他们相信他们的新精炼工艺将能够加工来自全球多个地点的关键矿物。

"These new sources for rare earths are going to be paramount if we're going to reach global net zero targets," said Steve Schoffstall of the Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O), which holds shares in several rare earths companies.翻译:Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O) 的 Steve Schoffstall 表示：“如果我们要实现全球净零目标，这些新的稀土来源将至关重要。”Sprott Energy Transition Materials ETF (SETM.O)持有多家稀土公司的股份。

item.title: 英国、芬兰、爱沙尼亚在波罗的海实践海底基础设施保护
item.description:
The navies of Britain, Finland and Estonia were practising subsea infrastructure protection in the Baltic Sea region on Monday together with the Finnish Border Guard, Finland's Defence Forces said in a statement.翻译:芬兰国防军在一份声明中表示，英国、芬兰和爱沙尼亚海军周一与芬兰边防卫队一起在波罗的海地区进行了海底基础设施保护演练。

In early October a gas pipeline linking Estonia and Finland was damaged along with three telecommunications cables in the area, which is known for its dense seabed infrastructure.翻译:十月初，连接爱沙尼亚和芬兰的一条天然气管道以及该地区的三条电信电缆遭到破坏，该地区以密集的海底基础设施而闻名。

Finland and Estonia suspect the gas pipeline and cable incidents are linked, and believe a Hong Kong-flagged container carrier caused the damage by dragging its anchor along the seabed. China has said it is willing to provide necessary information in accordance with international law.翻译:芬兰和爱沙尼亚怀疑天然气管道和电缆事件有关联，并认为一艘悬挂香港国旗的集装箱运输船因在海底拖动锚而造成了损害。中方表示愿意根据国际法提供必要信息。

The aim of the joint exercise, which continues on Tuesday, is to develop capabilities for the surveillance and protection of undersea infrastructure and to repel subsea military threats, Finland said.翻译:芬兰表示，周二继续进行的联合演习的目的是发展监视和保护海底基础设施的能力，并击退海底军事威胁。

"After the Balticconnector incident, many countries of the Baltic Sea region have increased their cooperation and their own national maritime surveillance operations," Commodore Janne Huusko of the Finnish Defence Command said.翻译:芬兰国防司令部准将詹尼·胡斯科表示：“波罗的海连接器事件发生后，波罗的海地区许多国家加强了合作，加强了本国的海上监视行动。”

All three participants are members of the NATO military alliance but the exercise is taking place under their Joint Expeditionary Force (JEF) defence cooperation, which encompasses the Nordic and Baltic states, the Netherlands and Britain.翻译:所有三个参与者都是北约军事联盟的成员，但此次演习是在其联合远征军（JEF）防务合作下进行的，其中包括北欧和波罗的海国家、荷兰和英国。

Britain said on Thursday it would send seven Royal Navy ships and a maritime patrol aircraft to take part in JEF patrols in the region in December.翻译:英国周四表示，将派遣七艘皇家海军舰艇和一架海上巡逻机参加 12 月在该地区的 JEF 巡逻。

In October, Britain had said it planned to step up its military presence in Northern Europe, including deploying 20,000 troops to the region next year, to help protect critical infrastructure at a time of growing concern over Russian sabotage.翻译:10月，英国曾表示计划加强在北欧的军事存在，包括明年向该地区部署2万名士兵，以在人们对俄罗斯破坏活动日益担忧之际帮助保护关键基础设施。

The Baltic Sea was also the scene last year of the destruction of the Nord Stream gas pipelines from Russia to Germany, which investigators say were deliberately blown up, although they have not yet named a suspect.翻译:去年，波罗的海也是从俄罗斯到德国的北​​溪天然气管道被毁的地点，调查人员称，该管道是被故意炸毁的，尽管他们尚未指定嫌疑人。

item.title: 顶级开发银行、基金成立“债务换自然”工作组
item.description:
A consortium of top multilateral development banks (MDB) and climate funds launched a global "task force" on Monday to scale up the number and size of 'debt-for-nature' swaps that countries can do.翻译:由顶级多边开发银行（MDB）和气候基金组成的财团周一成立了一个全球“特别工作组”，以扩大各国可以进行的“债务换自然”的数量和规模。

Debt-for-nature swaps, where a developing country's debt is cut in return for protecting vital ecosystems, are attracting growing interest following a number of successful deals in places such as Belize and the Galapagos Islands.翻译:债务换自然，即发展中国家通过削减债务来保护重要生态系统，继伯利兹和加拉帕戈斯群岛等地的一系列成功交易之后，债务换自然吸引了越来越多的兴趣。

The creation of the task force, which Reuters reported was underway last week, is the most significant step by the global club of multilateral lenders, which between them have trillions of dollars worth of firepower, to ramp up their support for these deals.翻译:据路透社上周报道，该工作组的成立是全球多边贷款机构俱乐部为加大对这些交易的支持而迈出的最重要一步，这些贷款机构拥有价值数万亿美元的火力。

It will initially be led by the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) and the U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC), lenders which between them have been involved in all the recent swaps, also including Barbados and Gabon.翻译:最初将由美洲开发银行（IDB）和美国国际开发金融公司（DFC）牵头，这两家银行参与了最近的所有互换，其中还包括巴巴多斯和加蓬。

The Asian Development Bank, the African Development Bank, France's Agence Française de Développement, and the European Investment Bank will also be part of the task force, as well as the Green Climate Fund and the Global Environment Facility.翻译:亚洲开发银行、非洲开发银行、法国开发署、欧洲投资银行以及绿色气候基金和全球环境基金也将成为该工作组的成员。

"We are looking to scale up and enhance the impact of climate and nature finance," IDB President Ilan Goldfajn said, with DFC CEO Scott Nathan adding that it "solidifies" a commitment by multilateral lenders to better co-operate.翻译:IDB 行长 Ilan Goldfajn 表示：“我们希望扩大并增强气候和自然金融的影响。” DFC首席执行官 Scott Nathan 补充道，这“巩固”了多边贷款机构更好合作的承诺。

Development banks play a particularly important role in debt-for-nature swaps because they provide the credit guarantees and/or political risk insurance that make them viable.翻译:开发银行在债务换自然中发挥着特别重要的作用，因为它们提供信用担保和/或政治风险保险，使债务换自然具有可行性。

At their simplest, the swaps work by buying up a country's bonds, often at a discount, and then replacing them with cheaper eco-labelled ones that come with the special MDB guarantees.翻译:最简单地说，互换的运作方式是通常以折扣价购买一个国家的债券，然后用带有多边开发银行特殊担保的更便宜的生态标签债券取代它们。

Those enhancements make them less of a default risk in the eyes of investors and therefore drive down their cost. Some of the savings - although not necessarily all, critics note - are then funnelled towards conservation efforts.翻译:这些增强功能降低了投资者眼中的违约风险，从而降低了成本。批评者指出，其中一些节省的资金（尽管不一定是全部）随后被用于保护工作。

Reporting by Marc Jones; Editing by Kirsten Donovan翻译:马克·琼斯的报道；克尔斯滕·多诺万编辑

item.title: 麦当劳加大对中国的押注，与西方公司降低风险的趋势背道而驰
item.description:
The decision by McDonald's (MCD.N) to take greater control of its China business and expand aggressively in the face of a consumer slowdown and geopolitical tensions seems risky - but the potential pay-off is great, analysts say.翻译:分析师表示，面对消费放缓和地缘政治紧张局势，麦当劳(MCD.N)决定加强对中国业务的控制并积极扩张，这似乎有风险，但潜在的回报是巨大的。

Last month, the U.S.-based burger maker cut a deal to repurchase the 28% stake in its China business Carlyle Group took in 2017, giving it a 48% share in $6 billion worth of operations that include Hong Kong and Macau.翻译:上个月，这家总部位于美国的汉堡制造商达成协议，回购凯雷投资集团 2017 年持有的中国业务 28% 的股份，使其在包括香港和澳门在内的价值 60 亿美元的业务中拥有 48% 的股份。

The move contrasts sharply with the prevailing trend of multinational corporations reeling back investments in China or even exiting altogether because of geopolitical and economic challenges.翻译:此举与跨国公司因地缘政治和经济挑战而减少在华投资甚至完全退出的普遍趋势形成鲜明对比。

One advantage for McDonald’s: its majority partner in the China business, CITIC, provides top-level political cover, said Jason Yu, greater China managing director of market research firm Kantar Worldpanel.翻译:市场研究公司凯度消费者指数(Kantar Worldpanel)大中华区总经理贾森·于(Jason Yu)表示，麦当劳的优势之一是：其在中国业务的主要合作伙伴中信集团提供了高层政治掩护。

"Having a very powerful Chinese state-owned conglomerate as a partner means they are not going to be at the forefront of the geopolitical situation; that is quite important," Yu said.翻译:“拥有一家非常强大的中国国有企业集团作为合作伙伴意味着他们不会处于地缘政治局势的最前沿；这一点非常重要，”于说。

McDonald's China, Carlyle Group and CITIC declined to comment.翻译:麦当劳中国、凯雷集团和中信集团均拒绝置评。

Other consumer-facing U.S. firms, including Starbucks (SBUX.O), Apple (AAPL.O), Coach owner Tapestry (TPR.N) and sportswear giant Nike (NKE.N), have remained similarly dedicated to the China market.翻译:其他面向消费者的美国公司，包括星巴克(SBUX.O) 、苹果(AAPL.O) 、Coach 所有者 Tapestry (TPR.N)和运动服装巨头耐克(NKE.N) ，也同样致力于中国市场。

Starbucks and Nike, which face increased competition from lower-priced domestic competitors, show the need to stay agile in order to protect and grow market share, analysts say.翻译:分析师表示，星巴克和耐克面临来自国内低价竞争对手的日益激烈的竞争，这表明需要保持敏捷性，以保护和扩大市场份额。

The coffee giant is sticking with expansion plans and launched a smaller cup size; Nike, by contrast, has offered localised, higher-end sneakers such as its "Year of the Rabbit" Dunk Lows.翻译:这家咖啡巨头坚持扩张计划，并推出了更小的杯子尺寸；相比之下，耐克则提供本地化的高端运动鞋，例如“兔年”Dunk Lows。

McDonald’s has used funds from the Carlyle investment to double its restaurant count since 2017 to 5,500, and the country has become its second-largest market. The business aims to have more than 10,000 stores in China by 2028.翻译:自 2017 年以来，麦当劳利用凯雷投资的资金将其餐厅数量增加了一倍，达到 5,500 家，中国已成为其第二大市场。该公司的目标是到2028年在中国拥有超过10,000家门店。

Competitors of McDonald's are also expanding their reach in China.翻译:麦当劳的竞争对手也在扩大其在中国的影响力。

Yum China, which operates KFC and Pizza Hut, among other brands, already has more than 14,000 stores across the country. Among domestic players, chicken burger specialist Wallace said in 2021 that it had reached 20,000 stores, and newer entrant Tastien, which specialises in "Chinese-style" burgers, has more than 3,500 stores.翻译:百胜中国旗下经营肯德基和必胜客等品牌，已在全国拥有超过14,000家门店。在国内企业中，鸡肉汉堡专家华莱士表示，2021年其门店数量已达到2万家，而新进入者专注于“中式”汉堡的Tastien则拥有超过3500家门店。

To be sure, if relations between China and the West worsen, any optimism could evaporate, said Greg Halter, Director of Research at investment advisory firm Carnegie Investment Counsel.翻译:投资咨询公司卡内基投资顾问公司(Carnegie Investment Counsel)研究总监格雷格·哈尔特(Greg Halter)表示，可以肯定的是，如果中国与西方之间的关系恶化，任何乐观情绪都可能消失。

"If tensions deteriorate, we may see not only McDonald's, but other companies divest their Chinese operations, similar to what has occurred in Russia over the past two years," Halter said.翻译:哈尔特表示：“如果紧张局势恶化，我们可能不仅会看到麦当劳，还会看到其他公司剥离其在中国的业务，类似于过去两年俄罗斯发生的情况。”

Further digitalisation and localisation are needed, Yu said, with localisation key to winning over taste buds in China's $140.2 billion limited-service restaurant sector.翻译:Yu 表示，需要进一步的数字化和本地化，而本地化是赢得中国价值 1,402 亿美元的有限服务餐饮业味蕾的关键。

Although the McDonald's China menu would be familiar to U.S. consumers, there are nods to local tastes, including taro pie, rather than apple.翻译:尽管麦当劳中国的菜单对美国消费者来说很熟悉，但还是迎合了当地的口味，包括芋头派，而不是苹果派。

According to Euromonitor, the market value of limited-service restaurants in China is on track to grow about 4% annually on average through 2025. Of the limited-service burger-focussed restaurants in the country, McDonald's dominates with a 70% share of the market.翻译:根据 Euromonitor 的数据，到 2025 年，中国有限服务餐厅的市场价值有望平均每年增长 4% 左右。在中国以汉堡为主的有限服务餐厅中，麦当劳占据主导地位，占据 70% 的市场份额。市场。

China's slowing economic growth and lacklustre consumer spending this year have already hurt the bottom lines of global businesses exposed to its consumer market, but McDonald's is well-placed to outperform, said Ben Cavender, the Shanghai-based managing director and head of strategy at China Market Research Group.翻译:麦当劳驻上海董事总经理兼中国战略主管本·卡文德 (Ben Cavender) 表示，今年中国经济增长放缓和消费支出低迷已经损害了与其消费市场相关的全球企业的利润，但麦当劳完全有能力跑赢大市。市场研究小组。

He said value-driven middle class consumers and lower commercial rents countrywide should be a boon to such businesses.翻译:他表示，价值驱动的中产阶级消费者和全国范围内较低的商业租金应该对此类企业有利。

"If ever there was a time to double down on China, this is it," he said.翻译:“如果有一个时机对中国加倍下注，那就是现在了，”他说。

Reporting by Casey Hall in Shanghai and Kane Wu in Hong Kong; additional reporting from Deborah Sophia in Bengaluru. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:上海Casey Hall和香港Kane Wu的报道；来自班加罗尔黛博拉·索菲亚的补充报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 随着亏损和债务的增加，中国大型养猪企业纷纷进军
item.description:
The biggest pig breeders in China, consumer of fully half the world's pork, seem to have bitten off more than they can chew.翻译:中国最大的养猪企业消耗了全球一半的猪肉，但它们似乎已经吃不消了。

Big agribusinesses have elbowed their way into the sector and are rapidly modernising it, but have expanded pig herds so aggressively that, with demand now in a downturn, their hog prices are falling, losses are mounting, and debt is rising.翻译:大型农业综合企业纷纷涌入该行业，并迅速实现现代化，但其生猪存栏规模却过于激进，在需求低迷的情况下，它们的生猪价格不断下跌，损失不断增加，债务不断增加。

More huge losses are expected next year, putting China's pig enterprises under pressure to slim down their breeding herds and sell off farms, many of which are sitting empty.翻译:预计明年将出现更多巨额亏损，这将使中国养猪企业面临减少种猪存栏和出售养殖场的压力，其中许多养殖场已空置。

For now, however, they are digging in, hoping to wait out the market downturn and reap a bonanza when prices eventually recover. And that is raising the stakes, not just for themselves but for their overseas feed suppliers, genetics firms, and the struggling global pork trade.翻译:然而，目前他们正在深耕，希望等待市场低迷结束，并在价格最终回升时收获丰厚的回报。这不仅增加了他们自己的风险，也增加了他们的海外饲料供应商、基因公司和陷入困境的全球猪肉贸易的风险。

"It all comes down to how deep these companies' pockets are," said Lyle Jones, China sales director at U.S.-based Genesus Inc, which supplies breeding pigs to the leading producers.翻译:“这一切都取决于这些公司的财力有多雄厚，”美国加裕公司中国销售总监莱尔琼斯说，该公司向领先的生产商供应种猪。

Hog farming, like other Chinese sectors from homebuilding to electric vehicles, has in recent years prioritised growth and market share over profits, creating a surplus that has driven pig prices lower and is now crowding out imports.翻译:与从住宅建筑到电动汽车等中国其他行业一样，生猪养殖近年来将增长和市场份额置于利润之上，造成的盈余导致生猪价格下跌，目前正在挤出进口。

China's cash hog prices have averaged well below even the most efficient producers' costs this year, for the first time in nearly a decade, and in the past three months alone have dropped 15% to 14.5 yuan per kilogram.翻译:今年，中国的生猪现金平均价格甚至远低于最高效生产者的成本，这是近十年来的首次，并且仅在过去三个月就下跌了15%，至每公斤14.5元。

The most-active live hog futures on the Dalian Commodity Exchange have tumbled 7.3% since the beginning of last week to 13,910 yuan ($1,949) per metric ton, the lowest since they began trading almost three years ago.翻译:大连商品交易所最活跃的生猪期货自上周初以来已下跌 7.3%，至每吨 13,910 元人民币（1,949 美元），为近三年前开始交易以来的最低水平。

The downdraft has defied both state efforts to prop up prices with token purchases for official reserves, and the start of the peak winter season for pork consumption.翻译:国家通过象征性购买官方储备来提振价格的努力，以及冬季猪肉消费旺季的开始，都无济于事。

And it is squeezing a number of big producers in the $200 billion-a-year industry, with the top 10 producers alone recording a 13% increase in net debt this year as of end-September, according to state-run media.翻译:据官方媒体报道，这一年产值达 2000 亿美元的行业中的一些大型生产商受到挤压，截至 9 月底，仅前 10 名生产商的净债务就增加了 13%。

New Hope Liuhe (000876.SZ), China's third-largest producer and the world's fifth largest, sold off farms last year and told investors in July it wanted to sell more, while bringing in strategic investors to its poultry and food units.翻译:中国第三大、全球第五大生产商新希望六和（000876.SZ）去年出售了农场，并于7月告诉投资者希望出售更多，同时为其家禽和食品部门引入战略投资者。

The company has made "some progress" on those fronts, it told investors on Friday, but gave no details. It also said a 7.35 billion yuan private share issue announced on Nov. 30 would help it to repay loans and rein in debt.翻译:该公司周五告诉投资者，在这些方面已经取得了“一些进展”，但没有透露细节。该公司还表示，11月30日宣布的73.5亿元非公开发行股票将有助于其偿还贷款和控制债务。

Major producers Tech-Bank (002124.SZ) and Fujian Aonong (603363.SS) have been selling off stakes in themselves or in subsidiaries to raise cash, while Aonong's debt-to-equity ratio reached a hefty 8.26 in the third quarter according to LSEG data. Neither company responded to requests for comment about their current challenges and working capital requirements.

EXPANDING DEBT

Jiangxi Zhengbang Technology (002157.SZ), which became China's second-largest producer after a rapid expansion drive, was forced into a restructuring last year despite support from local government-run firms.翻译:江西正邦科技（002157.SZ）经过快速扩张成为中国第二大生产商，尽管有地方政府企业的支持，但去年仍被迫进行重组。

Moreover, with debt levels swelling across the Chinese economy, banks and local governments have become less willing or able to offer support.翻译:此外，随着中国经济的债务水平不断膨胀，银行和地方政府提供支持的意愿或能力越来越低。

"Over the past two years, banks could lend them a lot so these companies expanded very fast," said an analyst at an equity research firm, who was not authorised to speak to the media and declined to be named.翻译:一家股票研究公司的分析师表示：“过去两年，银行可以向他们提供大量贷款，因此这些公司扩张得非常快。”该分析师未获授权接受媒体采访，但拒绝透露姓名。

But now, especially given the companies' high debt levels, the analyst said: "It's hard for them to borrow any money from the banks."翻译:但现在，特别是考虑到这些公司的高债务水平，分析师表示：“他们很难从银行借到任何钱。”

Analysts say the biggest players - industry leader Muyuan Foods Co , a low-cost producer and one of the few generating cashflow, and No. 2 Wens Foodstuff Group Co (300498.SZ), which has reduced costs significantly - may be well-positioned for a shake-out.翻译:分析师表示，最大的参与者——行业领先者牧原食品有限公司（一家低成本生产商，也是为数不多的产生现金流的企业之一）和排名第二的温氏食品集团有限公司（300498.SZ） ——成本大幅降低——可能处于有利地位。进行一次洗牌。

But challenges are mounting as China produces record volumes of pork, in part a legacy of past encouragement from Beijing, which fears food price volatility and urged a major expansion of sow herds after an African swine fever outbreak in the late 2010s killed half the country's pigs.翻译:但随着中国猪肉产量创历史新高，挑战也越来越大，这在一定程度上是北京过去鼓励政策的结果。北京担心食品价格波动，并在2010年代末非洲猪瘟爆发导致中国一半生猪死亡后敦促大幅扩大母猪存栏量。

Muyuan alone has more than tripled its sow herd since 2018, chasing after market share along with other big publicly listed firms, and now has three times as many sows as WH Group (0288.HK), which owns top U.S. producer Smithfield Foods.翻译:自2018年以来，仅牧原公司的母猪存栏量就增加了两倍多，与其他大型上市公司一起争夺市场份额，目前母猪数量是万洲国际（0288.HK）的三倍，后者拥有美国顶级生产商史密斯菲尔德食品公司。

Analysts at Hua'an Securities forecast that hog output would jump 10% in the first half of 2024. That follows a 17% surge in the first nine months of this year at China's 15 big market-listed breeders even as they reported 200 billion yuan in combined net losses.翻译:华安证券分析师预测，2024年上半年生猪产量将增长10%。今年前9个月，中国15家大型上市养殖企业的产值达2000亿元，但生猪产量仍增长17%。合并净亏损。

To make matters worse, pork consumption in China has been hit both by slowing economic growth and by diners' changing preferences, as more health-conscious consumers - especially young people and urbanites - switch to poultry and other foods.翻译:更糟糕的是，中国的猪肉消费受到经济增长放缓和食客偏好变化的打击，越来越多注重健康的消费者——尤其是年轻人和城市居民——转向家禽和其他食品。

And the costs of battling disease have risen substantially, with African swine fever now endemic and a constant threat to all farms.翻译:与疾病作斗争的成本大幅上升，非洲猪瘟现已流行，并持续威胁着所有农场。

China's agriculture ministry has warned of heavier losses for the sector in early 2024 than a year ago and urged pig producers to cut output.翻译:中国农业部警告称，2024年初该行业的损失将比一年前更严重，并敦促生猪生产者减产。

While the big producers have slashed spending on new equipment and taken other cost-cutting measures, most remain reluctant to unload idle farms and reduce breeding herds.翻译:尽管大型生产商已经削减了新设备的支出并采取了其他削减成本的措施，但大多数生产商仍然不愿意出售闲置农场并减少种猪群。

"Leading companies aggressively expanded in 2020-21, the capex was huge, and they're not willing to reduce capacity, even under the current weak price," said Flora Zhu, director of China Corporate Research at Fitch Ratings.翻译:惠誉国际评级中国企业研究总监朱芙表示：“2020-21年，龙头企业积极扩张，资本支出巨大，即使在当前疲软的价格下，他们也不愿意减少产能。”

($1 = 7.1364 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1364 人民币）

item.title: 早盘竞价：活跃的市场保持在今年高点附近
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

After closing at their highest level of the year on Friday, U.S. stocks mostly hogged those gains into the new week - with 'peak rates' optimism, Friday's U.S. jobs report and falling oil prices jockeying with edgy geopolitics for attention.翻译:在周五收于年内最高水平后，美国股市在新的一周中大多将涨幅延续到了新的一周——“利率峰值”乐观情绪、周五的美国就业报告以及油价下跌与尖锐的地缘政治争夺着人们的关注。

The S&P500 (.SPX) recorded its highest close since March 2022 on Friday - the month the Federal Reserve started its brutal five-percentage-point-plus interest rate squeeze. It's now just shy of a 20% gain for the year to date.翻译:周五，标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)录得自 2022 年 3 月以来的最高收盘价，同月美联储开始残酷地实施 5 个百分点以上的利率紧缩。今年迄今的涨幅仅略低于 20%。

The milestone was hit as Fed boss Jerome Powell, for many investors at least, gave his clearest signal yet that the rate campaign is over and the central bank was now weighing the effects and when it may be able to ease back.翻译:这一里程碑的实现是因为美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔（至少对许多投资者而言）发出了迄今为止最明确的信号，即利率行动已经结束，央行现在正在权衡其影响以及何时能够放松政策。

"We are getting what we wanted to get," Powell said during an event at Spelman College in Atlanta, noting the "full effects" of the Fed's rate hikes have not yet been felt.翻译:鲍威尔在亚特兰大斯佩尔曼学院的一次活动中表示：“我们正在得到我们想要的东西。”他指出，美联储加息的“全面影响”尚未显现。

Powell added that "the risks of under- and over-tightening are becoming more balanced" and the data would guide them from here.翻译:鲍威尔补充说，“紧缩不足和过度紧缩的风险正变得更加平衡”，数据将为他们提供指导。

Fed futures markets think a first cut may come as soon as March - with a quarter-point easing by then already two-thirds priced. Two-year Treasury yields hit their lowest since June on Friday and 10-year yields their lowest in three months, although they edged higher on Monday.翻译:美联储期货市场认为首次降息可能最早在三月份到来——届时降息四分之一个百分点已经是三分之二的定价。周五，两年期国债收益率触及六月以来的最低水平，十年期国债收益率创三个月以来的最低水平，但周一小幅走高。

Encouraging the disinflationary theme, oil prices extended declines, pressured by investor scepticism over the latest OPEC+ decision on supply cuts and uncertainty surrounding global fuel demand. U.S. crude hit its lowest in two weeks and is tracking year-on-year losses of almost 10%.翻译:受投资者对欧佩克+最新减产决定和全球燃料需求不确定性的怀疑的压力，油价延续跌势，鼓舞了通缩主题。美国原油价格跌至两周来的最低点，同比跌幅近 10%。

With rate cuts expected at least as soon as the Fed in Europe and around the world, the dollar held up well. (.DXY)翻译:由于预计美联储至少会在欧洲和世界各地降息，因此美元坚挺。 (.DXY)

Attention turns squarely to the labor market this week, with a series of updates on jobs and hiring that culminates in the November payrolls report on Friday. Hiring is expected to have picked up last month, but with the jobless rate staying at 3.9%.翻译:本周，注意力直接转向劳动力市场，一系列有关就业和招聘的最新消息，最终在周五的 11 月就业报告中达到顶峰。上个月招聘预计有所回升，但失业率仍维持在 3.9%。

Wall St stocks futures held the bulk of Friday's gains before the bell on Monday - giving back just 0.2%.翻译:华尔街股票期货在周一收盘前守住了周五的大部分涨幅，仅回落了 0.2%。

Some concerns about the resumption of fighting in Gaza and attacks on commercial shipping in the Red Sea saw volatility levels pop marginally higher and gold prices briefly surged to a new record before giving back all of those gains.翻译:对加沙战事恢复和红海商业航运袭击的一些担忧导致波动水平小幅上升，金价短暂飙升至新高，然后回吐了所有涨幅。

One of the worries about U.S. stock gains in the year to date has been the breadth, or lack of it, with a narrow leadership of megacap tech names. But that is widening into yearend as peak rate hopes encourage some rotation to smaller cap stocks. The S&P equal-weighted index (.EWGSPC) is now up 6% for 2023.翻译:今年迄今为止，人们对美国股市涨幅的担忧之一是，涨幅的广度或涨幅缺乏，大型科技股的领先优势有限。但这种情况正在扩大到年底，因为峰值利率希望鼓励一些资金转向小盘股。标准普尔等权重指数(.EWGSPC)目前预计 2023 年上涨 6%。

World stocks were generally holding up too.翻译:世界股市也普遍坚挺。

But the relentless underperformance of China continued and the blue-chip CSI 300 Index (.CSI300) fell 0.7%. Tech giants listed in Hong Kong (.HSTECH) fell for a fifth straight session, sliding 1.9%.翻译:但中国股市持续表现不佳，蓝筹股沪深300指数(.CSI300)下跌0.7%。在香港上市的科技巨头（.HSTECH）连续第五个交易日下跌，下跌 1.9%。

WuXi Biologics (2269.HK) plunged more than 20% on a disappointing earnings forecast and that weighed on Hong Kong markets generally - but the mood among foreign investors at least is dour.翻译:药明生物（2269.HK）因盈利预测令人失望而暴跌逾 20%，整体打压香港市场，但至少外国投资者的情绪低迷。

Chinese equities saw net outflows from long/short fund managers for a fourth successive month, mainly due to a reduction in long bets, Goldman Sachs' prime services team said in a report on Monday, without revealing the figure.翻译:高盛优质服务团队周一在一份报告中表示， 中国股市多头/空头基金经理连续第四个月出现净流出，主要是由于多头押注减少，但未透露具体数字。

The only positive was a near-10% jump in ailing Evergrande (3333.HK), which said it has been granted an adjournment of a court hearing into a liquidation petition to Jan. 29.翻译:唯一的利好是陷入困境的恒大地产(3333.HK)股价上涨近10%，该公司表示已获准将清算申请的法庭听证会推迟至1月29日。

In Europe, Greece's 10-year government bond yield dropped to its lowest level since June after ratings agency Fitch upgraded the country's sovereign credit rating to investment grade, citing the sharp downward trend in general government debt.翻译:在欧洲，评级机构惠誉以总体政府债务大幅下降为由，将希腊主权信用评级上调至投资级，导致希腊10年期政府债券收益率跌至6月份以来的最低水平。

Bitcoin joined gold's latest surge and broke above $40,000 for the first time since May 2022 as it rides a wave of momentum on peak interest rates.翻译:比特币跟随黄金的最新上涨势头，自 2022 年 5 月以来首次突破 40,000 美元，因为它乘着利率峰值的动力浪潮。

In corporate news, music streaming giant Spotify (SPOT.N) said it will lay off around 1,500 employees, or 17% of its headcount, to bring down costs, after letting 600 of its staff go in January, and 200 more in June.翻译:企业新闻方面，音乐流媒体巨头Spotify (SPOT.N)表示，在 1 月份解雇 600 名员工、6 月份又裁掉 200 名员工后，该公司将裁员约 1,500 名员工，占员工总数的 17%，以降低成本。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Monday:翻译:周一晚些时候应为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Oct factory goods orders翻译:* 美国10月工厂货订单

* European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde speaks翻译:* 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德讲话

* U.S. Treasury auctions 3-, 6-month bills翻译:* 美国财政部拍卖3个月、6个月期国债

* U.S. corporate earnings: GitLab, RGC Resources, Fusion Fuel Green, Joann翻译:* 美国企业盈利：GitLab、RGC Resources、Fusion Fuel Green、Joann

item.title: 华平投资集团在区域洗牌中任命新的亚洲私募股权主管
item.description:
Private equity firm Warburg Pincus on Monday named its India chief Vishal Mahadevia as head of Asia private equity, a newly created position, while veteran China head Frank Wei will step down amid an Asia-wide reshuffle at the U.S. investment firm.翻译:私募股权公司华平投资周一任命其印度首席执行官维沙尔·马哈德维亚(Vishal Mahadevia)为新设立的亚洲私募股权主管，而资深中国业务主管弗兰克·魏(Frank Wei)将在美国投资公司亚洲范围内的改组中辞职。

Mahadevia, a 17-year veteran of the firm, will remain as co-head of financial services as part of the changes in a region which accounts for about a third of its more than $84 billion of assets under management and where it is appointing new leaders for main markets including China and India, Warburg said.翻译:在该公司工作了 17 年的资深人士马哈德维亚 (Mahadvia) 将继续担任金融服务联席主管，这是该地区变革的一部分，该地区约占其管理的超过 840 亿美元资产的三分之一，并且正在任命新的负责人。瓦尔堡表示，中国和印度等主要市场的领导者。

"Investors are looking for balance and diversification across the region," Warburg President Jeffrey Perlman said in an interview. "As we look at our continued push across Asia Pacific, it's really bringing a regional approach and a regional mindset to that effort."翻译:华平总裁杰弗里·帕尔曼在接受采访时表示：“投资者正在寻求整个地区的平衡和多元化。” “当我们审视我们在亚太地区的持续推动时，它确实为这一努力带来了区域方法和区域思维。”

In China, Wei, who has worked at Warburg for over two decades, would step down from his current role but would remain as a managing director through 2024 to ensure a "seamless transition", the Warburg statement said.翻译:华平声明称，在中国，已在华平工作了二十多年的魏将辞去目前的职务，但将继续担任董事总经理直至 2024 年，以确保“无缝过渡”。

Partners Min Fang and Ben Zhou, who joined the firm in 2007 and 2005, respectively, would become co-heads of China private equity to lead investments in a country where it has had a presence for nearly 30 years.翻译:分别于2007年和2005年加入该公司的合伙人方敏和周本将成为中国私募股权部门的联席主管，领导该公司在中国开展业务近30年的投资。

"China is a very important market for us as a firm," Perlman said. "What most (investors) acknowledge is that it's very hard to ignore a $18 trillion market, which is really the scale that China has reached today."翻译:“中国对我们公司来说是一个非常重要的市场，”帕尔曼说。 “大多数（投资者）承认，很难忽视 18 万亿美元的市场，这正是中国今天所达到的规模。”

The moves come as Warburg is nearing completion of raising its 3 billion yuan ($420.5 million) maiden yuan-denominated fund, which will focus on the healthcare sector, a person with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:一位知情人士表示，此举正值华平即将完成其 30 亿元人民币（合 4.205 亿美元）首支人民币基金的募集工作，该基金将专注于医疗保健行业。

Warburg declined to comment.翻译:瓦尔堡拒绝置评。

Shanghai-based partner Jericho Zhang, who focused on the consumer sector, and another four China dealmakers had recently left the firm, adding to seven other departures last year mostly from its consumer or internet investment teams, two other people with knowledge of the matter said.翻译:另两名知情人士表示，专注于消费领域的上海合伙人张杰和另外四名中国交易撮合者最近离开了该公司，去年还有七名离职者，主要来自消费者或互联网投资团队。 。

A Warburg spokesperson said the firm was "making some modest changes to the structure and size of our team, to better support the opportunities in the region."翻译:华宝发言人表示，该公司“正在对我们团队的结构和规模进行一些适度的改变，以更好地支持该地区的机会。”

Asia-focused fundraising totalled $73 billion as of Nov 21, nearly half of 2022's annual amount and less than a third of the $299 billion raised in 2021, Preqin data shows.翻译:Preqin 数据显示，截至 11 月 21 日，以亚洲为重点的筹款总额为 730 亿美元，几乎是 2022 年年度融资额的一半，不到 2021 年筹集的 2990 亿美元融资额的三分之一。

Expectations that the Fed is done with the bulk of its rate hikes have led to a rebound in startup investments, but worries about a potential downturn in the near future are still weighing on sentiment.翻译:对美联储完成大部分加息的预期导致初创企业投资反弹，但对近期潜在经济低迷的担忧仍在打压市场情绪。

The U.S. investment heavyweight last month said it had raised $17.3 billion for its latest global flagship private equity fund, the largest in its nearly 60-year history.翻译:这家美国投资巨头上个月表示，已为其最新的全球旗舰私募股权基金筹集了 173 亿美元，这是其近 60 年历史上规模最大的一次。

Warburg raised a $4.25 billion private equity fund focusing on China and Southeast Asia in 2019, its second such fund.翻译:华平在 2019 年筹集了 42.5 亿美元的私募股权基金，专注于中国和东南亚，这是其第二支此类基金。

When asked if Warburg plans to raise a pan-Asia fund going forward, Perlman said the successor vehicle to the current fund would open up possibilities for other markets in the region.翻译:当被问及华宝未来是否计划筹集泛亚洲基金时，帕尔曼表示，当前基金的后继工具将为该地区其他市场开辟可能性。

With Mahadevia's promotion, Narendra Ostawal, a 16-year veteran, has been appointed head of India private equity.翻译:随着 Mahadevia 的晋升，拥有 16 年经验的纳伦德拉·奥斯塔瓦尔 (Narendra Ostawal) 被任命为印度私募股权业务主管。

In Singapore, Saurabh Agarwal who has been at the firm since 2009, has been named head of Southeast Asia private equity.翻译:在新加坡，自 2009 年起加入该公司的 Saurabh Agarwal 已被任命为东南亚私募股权业务主管。

Warburg also said that Takashi Murata, a former Goldman Sachs veteran, will be joining in early 2024 as head of Japan and co-Head of Asia real estate, alongside Ellen Ng.翻译:华平还表示，前高盛资深人士村田隆将于 2024 年初加入，与吴艾伦 (Ellen Ng) 一起担任日本业务主管兼亚洲房地产联席主管。

The firm, whose portfolio spans more than 250 companies, plans to open its Japan office next year, led by Takashi, as it seeks to bolster its business in developed markets and beef up its real restate and private equity investments in Japan, one of the sources said.翻译:该公司的投资组合涵盖 250 多家公司，计划明年在 Takashi 的领导下开设日本办事处，寻求加强其在发达市场的业务，并加强其在日本的房地产重述和私募股权投资。消息人士称。

item.title: 中国将蔚来汽车列入批准的汽车制造商名单 - 网站
item.description:
Electric vehicle maker Nio (9866.HK) has been added to a Chinese industry ministry database permitting companies to produce vehicles in the country, according to the ministry's website.翻译:据工信部网站称，电动汽车制造商蔚来汽车（9866.HK）已被添加到中国工信部数据库中，允许企业在中国生产汽车。

The website gave no details on whether or when a manufacturing licence was granted to Nio, which has since 2018 partnered with Anhui Jianghuai Automobile Group (JAC) to produce electric vehicles on a contract basis.翻译:该网站没有详细说明蔚来汽车是否或何时获得制造许可证。蔚来汽车自 2018 年以来一直与安徽江淮汽车集团 (JAC) 合作，以合同方式生产电动汽车。

Nio said in response to a Reuters query that it currently had no information to share.翻译:蔚来在回应路透社询问时表示，目前没有可分享的信息。

Receiving a manufacturing licence would clear some uncertainty over the impact on Nio of JAC's plans to sell some assets belonging to the two factories that make Nio EVs.翻译:获得制造许可证将消除江淮汽车计划出售属于生产蔚来电动汽车的两家工厂的部分资产对蔚来影响的一些不确定性。

The state-backed newspaper China Securities Journal in October reported JAC's (600418.SS) sale plans. Nio said at the time that such a sale would not affect its future production activities.翻译:国有报纸《中国证券报》十月份报道了江淮汽车（600418.SS）的出售计划。蔚来当时表示，此类出售不会影响其未来的生产活动。

Granting Nio a production licence also marks a shift for Chinese authorities, which have been cautious about approving new production amid overcapacity and a deepening price war that has pulled in over 40 brands.翻译:授予蔚来汽车生产许可证也标志着中国当局的转变，由于产能过剩和价格战不断加深，中国当局对批准新生产持谨慎态度，这场价格战已吸引了 40 多个品牌参与。

Tesla Inc (TSLA.O) had yet to win a regulatory nod to proceed with its Shanghai plant expansion plan, Reuters reported in June. U.S. luxury EV maker Lucid Group (LCID.O) has also been advised of the low likelihood for approval, sources have told Reuters.翻译:据路透社 6 月份报道，特斯拉公司(TSLA.O)尚未获得监管机构批准继续其上海工厂扩建计划。消息人士告诉路透社，美国豪华电动汽车制造商 Lucid Group (LCID.O)也被告知获得批准的可能性很低。

To produce and sell cars in China, automakers have to first obtain a permit from the state planner and then the industry ministry. The last EV maker to receive both permits was Shandong-headquartered EV maker Sinogold in May 2019.翻译:要在中国生产和销售汽车，汽车制造商必须首先获得国家规划部门的许可，然后获得工业部的许可。最后一家获得这两项许可证的电动汽车制造商是总部位于山东的电动汽车制造商中金公司，时间为 2019 年 5 月。

Nio ranked ninth in terms of EV sales in the first 10 months in China with 126,067 units, according to data from China Passenger Car Association.翻译:根据中国乘用车联席会的数据，蔚来汽车前 10 个月在中国的电动汽车销量为 126,067 辆，排名第九。

The company has been trying to improve profitability, as it trims its workforce and defers long-term investments to improve efficiency and reduce costs in the face of growing competition.翻译:面对日益激烈的竞争，该公司一直在努力提高盈利能力，通过裁员和推迟长期投资来提高效率和降低成本。

Reporting by Cui Zhuzhu, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Emelia Sithole-Matarise翻译:崔珠珠、张岩、Brenda Goh报道；编辑：埃米莉亚·西托尔-马塔里斯

item.title: 特斯拉11月份中国制造电动汽车销量下降17.8%，创2022年12月以来最大跌幅
item.description:
Sales of U.S. automaker Tesla's (TSLA.O) China-made electric vehicles (EVs) skidded 17.8% in November from the same month a year earlier, to 82,432 cars, China Passenger Car Association (CPCA) data showed on Monday.翻译:中国乘用车协会 (CPCA) 周一的数据显示，美国汽车制造商特斯拉(TSLA.O)的中国制造电动汽车 (EV) 11 月份销量同比下滑 17.8%，至 82,432 辆。

That marked the biggest fall since December 2022 when Tesla's sales of China-made EVs fell 21% on the year as the U.S. automaker reduced output and cut prices to deal with rising inventories and weakening demand.翻译:这是自 2022 年 12 月以来的最大跌幅，当时特斯拉中国制造的电动汽车销量同比下降 21%，原因是这家美国汽车制造商减少产量并降价以应对库存增加和需求疲软。

Deliveries of China-made Model 3 and Model Y cars were however 14.3% higher than in October.翻译:然而，中国制造的 Model 3 和 Model Y 汽车的交付量比 10 月份增长了 14.3%。

Chinese rival BYD (002594.SZ), with its Dynasty and Ocean series of EVs and petrol-electric hybrid models, saw passenger vehicle deliveries set another record at 301,378 vehicles in November, up 0.09% from October and 31% from a year earlier.翻译:中国竞争对手比亚迪（002594.SZ）凭借其王朝和海洋系列电动汽车和油电混合动力车型，11月份乘用车交付量再创新高，达到301,378辆，环比增长0.09%，同比增长31%。

Tesla has been under pressure to fend off competition in the world's largest auto market, though CEO Elon Musk's charm offensive in China continues unabated.翻译:尽管首席执行官埃隆·马斯克在中国的魅力攻势有增无减，但特斯拉一直面临着抵御全球最大汽车市场竞争的压力。

Musk was among a small group of top U.S. executives who met with Chinese President Xi Jinping before a dinner event on the sidelines of the APEC summit in San Francisco in mid-November.翻译:11 月中旬，在旧金山 APEC 峰会期间举行的晚宴上，马斯克是一小群美国高管中与中国国家主席习近平会面的人之一。

Xi expressed his support for Tesla's development in China, the automaker said in a Weibo post. Musk, in response, said he appreciated the rapid development of China's new energy vehicle sector.翻译:特斯拉在微博中表示，习近平表达了对特斯拉在中国发展的支持。马斯克回应称，他对中国新能源汽车行业的快速发展表示赞赏。

A Tesla-triggered price war in China since the start of the year has roped in more than 40 brands but its share of the country's EV market dropped to 5.78% in October from 8.7% in September, Reuters' calculations based on CPCA data show, as EV sales reached a monthly record.翻译:路透社根据CPCA数据计算显示，年初以来特斯拉在中国引发的价格战已经吸引了40多个品牌，但其在中国电动汽车市场的份额从9月份的8.7%下降到10月份的5.78%，随着电动汽车销量创下月度纪录。

Since late October, Tesla has made five upward price adjustments in China where EV demand growth is slowing as consumers favour more affordable plug-in hybrids even with an ever-increasing range of battery-only vehicles.翻译:自10月下旬以来，特斯拉在中国已进行了五次价格上调。中国的电动汽车需求增长正在放缓，因为消费者青睐更实惠的插电式混合动力汽车，尽管纯电池汽车的种类不断增加。

Li Auto (2015.HK) last month said mass production and delivery of its first full EV are scheduled for February.翻译:理想汽车（2015.HK）上个月表示，其首款纯电动汽车计划于 2 月份量产和交付。

Smartphone maker Xiaomi (1810.HK) has also moved closer to EV production, with a unit of automaker BAIC Group (1958.HK) applying for regulatory approval to build two Xiaomi-branded cars.翻译:智能手机制造商小米（1810.HK）也向电动汽车生产迈进，汽车制造商北汽集团（1958.HK）旗下子公司正在申请监管部门批准生产两款小米品牌汽车。

Reporting by Qiaoyi Li, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Bernadette Baum, Kirsten Donovan翻译:李巧仪、张岩、Brenda Goh 报道；责任编辑：伯纳黛特·鲍姆、克尔斯滕·多诺万

item.title: 中国称与欧盟领导人举行峰会讨论全球经济问题
item.description:
An China-EU summit will be held on Thursday in Beijing, China's foreign ministry said on Monday, where leaders of both sides will discuss strategic and global economic issues of common interest.翻译:中国外交部周一表示，中欧峰会将于周四在北京举行，双方领导人将讨论共同关心的战略和全球经济问题。

"China and Europe are partners, not rivals ... our common interests far outweigh our differences," foreign ministry spokesperson Wang Wenbin said at a regular press briefing.翻译:外交部发言人汪文斌在例行记者会上表示，“中欧是合作伙伴，不是竞争对手……我们的共同利益远远大于分歧。”

Chinese President Xi Jinping will meet with President of the European Council Charles Michel and President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen, Wang said.翻译:王毅表示，中国国家主席习近平将分别会见欧洲理事会主席米歇尔和欧盟委员会主席冯德莱恩。

"We will explore ways to solve problems through dialogue and consultation," Wang said, adding that "we will cooperate to meet global challenges and inject new impetus into the world and increase stability in the international situation."翻译:“我们将探讨通过对话协商解决问题的办法，”王说，“我们将合作应对全球性挑战，为世界注入新动力，增强国际局势的稳定性。”

The summit follows several high-level meetings between the EU and China in Beijing in then months leading to it, seeking to find common ground in their complex relations.翻译:此次峰会之前的几个月里，欧盟和中国在北京举行了几次高层会议，寻求在复杂的关系中找到共同点。

The European bloc had the middle of this year committed to cutting dependence on China and debated how to strike a balance between "de-risking" and cooperating in areas such as climate change.翻译:欧盟于今年年中承诺减少对中国的依赖，并就如何在“去风险”与气候变化等领域合作之间取得平衡进行了辩论。

In September, EU agreed to set up dispute settlement mechanisms when its Trade Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis visited Beijing, less than a fortnight after the European Commission launched a probe into whether to impose punitive tariffs on cheaper Chinese electric vehicle imports to protect EU producers.翻译:9月，欧盟贸易委员瓦尔迪斯·东布罗夫斯基斯(Valdis Dombrovskis)访问北京时同意建立争端解决机制，距离欧盟委员会启动调查是否对更便宜的中国电动汽车进口产品征收惩罚性关税以保护欧盟生产商不到两周。

The following month, EU's top diplomat Josep Borrell told Chinese officials that Brussels took China seriously and expected the same in return on geopolitical issues and trade.翻译:接下来的一个月，欧盟高级外交官何塞普·博雷尔告诉中国官员，布鲁塞尔认真对待中国，并希望在地缘政治问题和贸易问题上得到同样的回报。

China last month said it will temporarily allow visa-free travel for citizens of some countries including France, Germany, Italy and the Netherlands.翻译:中国上个月表示，将暂时允许法国、德国、意大利和荷兰等一些国家的公民免签旅行。

While talks have focused largely on trade, economy and politics, Human Rights Watch's EU director Philippe Dam urged Michel and Von der Leyen to press China on rights violation issues.翻译:虽然会谈主要集中在贸易、经济和政治上，但人权观察组织欧盟主任菲利普·达姆敦促米歇尔和冯德莱恩就侵犯人权问题向中国施压。

item.title: 白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科回国寻求加强双边关系
item.description:
Belarussian President Alexander Lukashenko met China's leader Xi Jinping in Beijing on Monday for the second time this year, with the diplomatically isolated leader talking up his country's economic ties to the Asian giant amid biting Western sanctions.翻译:白俄罗斯总统亚历山大·卢卡申科周一在北京会见了中国领导人习近平，这是今年第二次，这位在外交上孤立的领导人在西方严厉的制裁下谈论了白俄罗斯与这个亚洲巨人的经济关系。

The close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin is on a "working visit" to the Chinese capital and was received by Xi at the Diaoyutai State Guesthouse for a "working lunch" and three hours of talks, according to Belarussian state media.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京的亲密盟友正在对中国首都进行“工作访问”，并在钓鱼台国宾馆受到习近平的接见，共进“工作午餐”并进行了三个小时的会谈。

Lukashenko, the president of Belarus since 1994, backed Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February 2022 by allowing Moscow to use its territory to launch the war, but is faced with a crippled economy that is heavily reliant on trade with Russia.翻译:卢卡申科自 1994 年起担任白俄罗斯总统，他支持俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰，允许莫斯科使用其领土发动战争，但卢卡申科面临着严重依赖与俄罗斯贸易的严重受损的经济。

"China is willing to continue to strengthen strategic cooperation with Belarus, promote practical cooperation and deepen bilateral relations," Xi told his guest, according to Chinese state news agency Xinhua.翻译:据中国国家通讯社新华社报道，习近平对客人表示：“中方愿同白俄罗斯继续加强战略合作，推进务实合作，深化双边关系。”

"The two sides should implement projects like the China-Belarus Industrial Park and promote more achievements in China-Belarus industrial cooperation," Xinhua reported Xi as saying.翻译:新华社报道习近平表示，“双方要落实好中白工业园等项目，推动中白工业合作取得更多成果。”

The world's second-largest economy was Belarus' seventh largest trading partner in 2021 and before the war in Ukraine, according U.N. Comtrade data. China was Belarus' second-largest import partner, but the Eastern European country bought around three-quarters less from China than it did from Russia.翻译:根据联合国商品贸易统计数据库 (UN Comtrade) 的数据，2021 年和乌克兰战争之前，世界第二大经济体是白俄罗斯的第七大贸易伙伴。中国是白俄罗斯的第二大进口伙伴，但这个东欧国家从中国购买的商品比从俄罗斯购买的商品少约四分之三。

Lukashenko highlighted the scope to grow his country's commercial ties with China, Belarussian state media said, and lauded the "more than 120" two-way visits made by Chinese and Belarussian parties since the leaders last met in March.翻译:白俄罗斯官方媒体称，卢卡申科强调了发展白俄罗斯与中国商业关系的范围，并赞扬自3月份两国领导人上次会晤以来，中国和白俄罗斯双方进行了“120多次”双向访问。

Quickening the pace of cooperation between China and Belarus was "the only issue" Lukashenko wished to discuss with Xi on this visit to the Chines capital, the report added.翻译:报道补充说，加快中白合作步伐是卢卡申科此次访问中国首都“唯一希望与习近平讨论的问题”。

Xi told Lukashenko that both countries should improve cross-border transport facilitation and promote economic and trade initiatives like the China-Belarus Industrial Park, as well as people-to-people exchanges, according to Xinhua.翻译:据新华社报道，习近平对卢卡申科表示，两国要改善跨境交通便利化，推动中白工业园等经贸项目和人文交流。

Belarus faces sanctions from the United States, European Union, Britain, Canada, the Netherlands, and a number of other countries over its support of Russia's invasion of Ukraine and longer standing issues surrounding political repression.翻译:白俄罗斯因支持俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以及围绕政治镇压的长期问题而面临美国、欧盟、英国、加拿大、荷兰和其他一些国家的制裁。

Lukashenko told Xi that the world would thank China for its efforts to bring countries into his flagship Belt and Road Initiative, "unlike Western countries that are trying to cut everything into pieces," Belarussian state media reported.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，卢卡申科告诉习近平，世界将感谢中国为将各国纳入其旗舰“一带一路”倡议所做的努力，“这与西方国家试图将一切分割成碎片的做法不同”。

Xi offered to enhance coordination and cooperation between China and Belarus in multilateral mechanisms such as the United Nations and the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation, the Xinhua report said.翻译:新华社报道称，习近平提出加强中白在联合国、上海合作组织等多边机制中的协调与合作。

"China and Belarus are important forces in the reform and construction of the global governance system," it quoted Xi as saying.翻译:习近平表示，“中白是全球治理体系改革和建设的重要力量”。

item.title: 韩国将就尿素出口延误问题与中国磋商
item.description:
South Korea on Monday said it will consult China to prevent disruption to urea supplies after Korean companies reported the fertiliser and emissions reducing chemical was taking longer to pass through Chinese customs on its way to the peninsula.翻译:韩国周一表示，将与中国协商，以防止尿素供应中断，此前韩国公司报告称，化肥和减排化学品在运往半岛的过程中通过中国海关的时间较长。

The reports follow calls from China's nitrogen fertiliser association last month to prioritise supplies for domestic use after prices hit a two-year high. They also come after Indian industry figures in September flagged delays at Chinese ports.翻译:在此报告发布之前，中国氮肥协会上个月在价格触及两年高点后呼吁优先供应国内使用。此前，印度行业数据显示中国港口出现延误。

The issue has raised concern about a repeat of a supply crunch in 2021 when China's government effectively halted exports of urea - a type of nitrogen used as fertiliser in agriculture as well as to curb diesel and industrial emissions.翻译:这一问题引发了人们对 2021 年供应紧缩重演的担忧，当时中国政府实际上停止了尿素的出口。尿素是一种用作农业肥料以及抑制柴油和工业排放的氮。

South Korea imports over 90% of its urea supply from China.翻译:韩国90%以上的尿素供应来自中国。

"We have confirmed customs delays, and there was no political background but economic factors, mainly due to tight urea supplies within China," Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy spokesperson Choi Nam-ho told a briefing on Monday.翻译:产业通商资源部发言人崔南浩周一在新闻发布会上表示：“我们已确认海关延误，这不是政治背景，而是经济因素，主要是由于中国国内尿素供应紧张。”

In a statement late on Sunday, the ministry said it had supplies sufficient for three months, with imports also coming from Vietnam and Japan.翻译:该部在周日晚间的一份声明中表示，其供应量足以维持三个月，其中还从越南和日本进口。

It also said it was working to prevent shortages by boosting reserves for vehicle use and supporting the industry to diversify import channels.翻译:它还表示，正在通过增加汽车使用储备和支持该行业实现进口渠道多元化来努力防止短缺。

South Korean trade minister Ahn Duk-geun also met with his counterpart in Beijing on Monday and called on China to immediately resolve the customs clearance issue, the ministry said in a separate statement on Monday.翻译:韩国贸易部长安德根周一也在北京会见了外长，并呼吁中国立即解决清关问题，该部周一在另一份声明中表示。

In late 2021, a new Chinese export requirement aimed at increasing domestic supplies triggered panic buying among South Korean drivers of diesel cars and trucks who are required to use urea solutions to cut emissions.翻译:2021年底，中国旨在增加国内供应的新出口要求引发了韩国柴油汽车和卡车司机的恐慌性购买，他们被要求使用尿素溶液来减少排放。

South Korea resorted to government rations while trying to secure alternative suppliers. It even scrambled a military tanker plane to Australia.翻译:韩国诉诸政府配给，同时试图确保替代供应商。它甚至紧急升空一架军用加油机飞往澳大利亚。

Diesel cars account for about 40% of registered vehicles in South Korea.翻译:柴油车约占韩国登记车辆的40%。

Reporting by Hyonhee Shin; Additional reporting by Joyce Lee; Editing by Ed Davies and Christopher Cushing and Miral Fahmy翻译:申贤熙报道；乔伊斯·李的补充报道；编辑：埃德·戴维斯、克里斯托弗·库欣和米拉尔·法赫米

item.title: 中国军方：美国海军舰艇“非法”进入领海
item.description:
China's military on Monday said a U.S. Navy ship illegally entered waters adjacent to the Second Thomas Shoal, a disputed South China Sea atoll that has recently seen several maritime confrontations.翻译:中国军方周一表示，一艘美国海军舰艇非法进入仁爱礁附近海域。仁爱礁是一个有争议的南海环礁，最近发生了多起海上冲突。

"The U.S. seriously undermined regional peace and stability," a spokesperson for China's Southern Theater of Operations said in a statement, adding that the U.S. disrupted the South China Sea and violated China's sovereignty.翻译:中国南方战区发言人在一份声明中表示，美国严重破坏地区和平稳定，并补充说，美国扰乱南海，侵犯中国主权。

China is in disputes with several of its neighbours over its extensive claims of territorial waters in the South China Sea.翻译:中国与几个邻国就其在南海的广泛领海主张存在争议。

The U.S. Navy said the USS Gabrielle Giffords, an Independence-class littoral combat ship, was conducting routine operations in international waters in the South China Sea, consistent with international law.翻译:美国海军表示，独立级濒海战斗舰加布里埃尔·吉福兹号正在南海国际水域进行例行行动，符合国际法。

"Every day the U.S. 7th Fleet operates in the South China Sea, as they have for decades," the U.S. Navy said in a statement. "These operations demonstrate we are committed to upholding a free and open Indo-Pacific region."翻译:美国海军在一份声明中表示：“美国第七舰队每天都在南海活动，几十年来一直如此。” “这些行动表明我们致力于维护自由开放的印太地区。”

In recent months, China has had several runs-ins with Philippine vessels, and protested about U.S. ships patrolling disputed areas.翻译:近几个月来，中国与菲律宾船只发生了数次冲突，并对美国船只在争议地区巡逻表示抗议。

According to the Chinese military, the U.S. ship moved into waters adjacent to what China calls the Renai Reef, also known as Second Thomas Shoal, a part of the Spratly Islands. The Second Thomas Shoal lies in the Philippines' exclusive economic zone, according to an United Nations tribunal ruling in 2016.翻译:据中国军方称，美国船只进入了中国所说的仁爱礁（也称为仁爱礁，南沙群岛的一部分）附近海域。根据联合国法庭 2016 年的裁决，仁爱礁位于菲律宾的专属经济区。

The Chinese military spokesperson said the U.S. ship was monitored and followed, and that China's "troops in the theater are on high alert at all times to resolutely defend national sovereignty".翻译:中国军方发言人表示，美舰受到监视跟踪，中国“战区部队时刻保持高度戒备，坚决捍卫国家主权”。

"We will not be deterred from continuing to work alongside our allies and partners in support of our shared vision for a free and open Indo-pacific," the U.S. Navy responded.翻译:美国海军回应说：“我们不会被阻止继续与我们的盟友和伙伴合作，支持我们关于自由开放的印度太平洋地区的共同愿景。”

On Sunday, the Philippine Coast Guard deployed two of its vessels in the South China Sea after monitoring an "alarming" increase in the number of Chinese maritime militia vessels at a reef within the country's exclusive economic zone.翻译:周日，菲律宾海岸警卫队在南海部署了两艘船只，此前菲律宾海岸警卫队监测到该国专属经济区内的一个珊瑚礁上的中国海上民兵船只数量“令人震惊”地增加。

Reporting by Bernard Orr; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama, Diane Craft and Gerry Doyle翻译:伯纳德·奥尔报道；编辑：Chizu Nomiyama、Diane Craft 和 Gerry Doyle

item.title: 比亚迪称将保留对抹黑举报人的奖励制度
item.description:
China's electric vehicle giant BYD (002594.SZ) said on Sunday it would make permanent its system offering tipsters who report smear campaigns against the company up to 5 million yuan ($700,918).翻译:中国电动汽车巨头比亚迪(002594.SZ)周日表示，将永久性地向举报该公司抹黑活动的举报者提供最高 500 万元人民币（700,918 美元）的奖励。

The company in June 2022 increased the maximum amount providers of such information could receive from 1 million yuan to 5 million yuan, saying that policy was valid for a year. The minimum amount is 50,000 yuan.翻译:该公司于2022年6月将此类信息提供者可获得的最高金额从100万元提高到500万元，并称政策有效期为一年。最低金额为5万元。

"The evidence we collect includes but is not limited to chat records, emails, contracts, fund transfers and other information," the company said in a Weibo post. "Such information should be legally effective and BYD will give the provider a generous reward once it verifies it to be true."翻译:该公司在微博中表示，“我们收集的证据包括但不限于聊天记录、电子邮件、合同、资金转账等信息。” “此类信息应当具有法律效力，比亚迪一旦核实属实，将给予提供者丰厚的奖励。”

BYD did not say why it extended the reward programme, which it introduced in late 2021, saying it wanted to combat online smear campaigns and to protect the company's brand image. It did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment on Monday.翻译:比亚迪没有透露为何延长 2021 年底推出的奖励计划，称其希望打击网络诽谤活动并保护公司的品牌形象。该公司周一没有立即回应路透社的置评请求。

In September, the company hit back against online discussions that said BYD had leaked commercial secrets, saying those posts were pure rumours. It added that the police had apprehended the person responsible for spreading the rumour and that the company planned to take legal action.翻译:9月份，该公司对网上有关比亚迪泄露商业机密的讨论进行了反击，称这些帖子纯属谣言。该公司还表示，警方已逮捕散布谣言的责任人，该公司计划采取法律行动。

Warren Buffett-backed BYD is China's largest seller of electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles, and Tesla's (TSLA.O) closest rival in the global electric vehicle sales race.翻译:沃伦·巴菲特支持的比亚迪是中国最大的电动和插电式混合动力汽车销售商，也是特斯拉(TSLA.O)在全球电动汽车销售竞赛中最接近的竞争对手。

The company, which has been expanding overseas along with several other Chinese EV makers, broke records with new energy vehicle (NEV) sales rising 53% year-on-year to 824,001 in the third quarter, according to company data.翻译:该公司一直与其他几家中国电动汽车制造商一起向海外扩张，根据公司数据，第三季度新能源汽车 (NEV) 销量同比增长 53% 至 824,001 辆，打破了记录。

($1 = 7.1335 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1335 人民币）

Reporting by Brenda Goh. Editing by Gerry Doyle翻译:布伦达·吴报道。格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 台湾总统说，投票时想想香港发生了什么
item.description:
Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen appealed to voters on Sunday to think of what had happened to Chinese-controlled Hong Kong when they cast their ballots next month, saying peace must be backed up with a commitment to boost defences.翻译:台湾总统蔡英文周日呼吁选民在下个月投票时想想中国控制的香港发生了什么，并表示和平必须以加强防御的承诺为后盾。

Taiwan prepares for presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13 as China, which claims the democratically governed island as its own territory, ramps up military pressure to assert its claims, including two major war games around the island in the past year and a half.翻译:台湾正在为 1 月 13 日的总统和议会选举做准备，中国声称这个民主治理的岛屿是​​自己的领土，并加大军事压力以维护其主权，包括在过去一年半的时间里在台湾举行了两次大型战争演习。

China and Taiwan's main opposition party, the Kuomintang (KMT), have cast the election as a choice between war and peace. China detests Taiwan's ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) and its presidential candidate, Vice President Lai Ching-te, calling them dangerous separatists.翻译:中国大陆和台湾主要反对党国民党都将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。中国憎恨台湾执政的民进党及其总统候选人、副总统赖清德，称他们是危险的分裂分子。

Addressing supporters at a campaign rally for Lai in the capital Taipei, Tsai said the opposition was using "alarmist talk" of war and peace.翻译:蔡英文在首都台北举行的赖智竞选集会上向支持者发表讲话时表示，反对派正在利用战争与和平的“危言耸听的言论”。

"I want to ask you all here, does anyone want war? Nobody does," she said. "Look at Hong Kong and think of Taiwan. We don't want Hong Kong-style peace. We want dignified peace."翻译:“我想问你们所有人，有人想要战争吗？没有人想要，”她说。 “看看香港，想想台湾。我们不想要香港式的和平。我们想要有尊严的和平。”

Hong Kong, a former British colony, was returned to Chinese rule in 1997 with the promise of wide autonomy under a "one country, two systems" framework, which China has also offered to Taiwan - with little support on the island.翻译:香港是前英国殖民地，1997年回归中国统治，并承诺在“一国两制”框架下享有广泛自治权，中国也向台湾提供了这种自治权，但台湾方面几乎没有支持。

Beijing in 2020 imposed a tough national security law on Hong Kong, which it said was vital to restore stability after the city, a global financial hub, was rocked for months by sometimes violent anti-government and anti-China protests in 2019.翻译:北京于 2020 年对香港实施了严厉的国家安全法，称该法对于恢复香港的稳定至关重要，因为这座全球金融中心在 2019 年经历了数月的暴力反政府和反中抗议活动。

Tsai, barred by term limits from seeking re-election, has made bolstering Taiwan's defences a cornerstone of her tenure, a stance that Lai, leading in the polls, has pledged to continue.翻译:由于任期限制，蔡英文无法寻求连任，她已将加强台湾的防御作为其任期的基石，在民意调查中领先的赖清德承诺将继续保持这一立场。

They say only Taiwan's people can decide their future and have repeatedly offered talks with China but been rebuffed.翻译:他们说，只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来，并多次提出与中国进行谈判，但遭到拒绝。

"To ensure peace we need to strengthen our ability to defend ourselves. Our house will have locks on it, but not to provoke our neighbours," Tsai told the rally. "Only with determination can we defend dignity, and only with strength can we ensure peace."翻译:“为了确保和平，我们需要加强自卫能力。我们的房子会上锁，但不会激怒我们的邻居，”蔡英文在集会上说。 “只有坚定，才能捍卫尊严，只有实力，才能确保和平。”

KMT presidential candidate Hou Yu-ih said on Saturday a vote for the DPP was equivalent to "sending everyone out to the battlefield" because supporting Taiwan independence would touch off a war.翻译:国民党总统候选人侯裕义周六表示，投票给民进党相当于“把所有人送上战场”，因为支持台独会引发战争。

The KMT traditionally favours close ties with China but strongly denies being pro-Beijing. It has pledged to reopen talks with China if it wins election.翻译:国民党传统上倾向于与中国建立密切关系，但强烈否认亲北京。它承诺如果赢得选举将与中国重启谈判。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by William Mallard翻译:本·布兰查德报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 菲律宾部署船只监视中国船只在南海的“非法”存在
item.description:
The Philippine Coast Guard (PCG) has deployed two of its vessels in the South China Sea after monitoring an "alarming" increase in the number of Chinese maritime militia vessels at a reef within the country's exclusive economic zone (EEZ).翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队（PCG）监测到中国专属经济区（EEZ）内珊瑚礁上的中国海上民兵船只数量“令人震惊”地增加，随后在南海部署了两艘船只。

The number of Chinese boats believed to be manned by militia personnel has increased to more than 135 from 111 in November, scattered within the Whitsun Reef, which Manila calls the Julian Felipe Reef, the PCG said in a statement.翻译:PCG在一份声明中表示，据信由民兵人员驾驶的中国船只数量已从11月的111艘增加到超过135艘，这些船只分散在圣灵礁（马尼拉称之为朱利安费利佩礁）内。

"The PCG maintains its unwavering commitment to safeguarding maritime security, safety and the marine environment in the course of protecting the territorial integrity, sovereignty, sovereign rights, and jurisdiction of the Philippines in the West Philippine Sea," it said.翻译:声明称：“菲律宾海岸警卫队在保护菲律宾在西菲律宾海的领土完整、主权、主权权利和管辖权的过程中，坚定不移地致力于维护海上安全、安全和海洋环境。”

The West Philippine Sea is Manila's term for waters in the South China Sea that fall within its 200-nautical mile EEZ.翻译:西菲律宾海是马尼拉对南海 200 海里专属经济区水域的称呼。

There was no immediate comment from the Chinese Embassy in Manila.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即发表评论。

An international tribunal invalidated China's claim to 90% of the South China Sea in 2016, but Beijing does not recognise the ruling. China has built islands in the disputed waters in recent years, laying air strips on some of them.翻译:2016年，国际法庭宣告中国对南海90%领土的主权主张无效，但北京不承认这一裁决。近年来，中国在争议海域修建岛屿，并在其中一些岛屿上铺设了飞机跑道。

Taiwan, Malaysia, Vietnam, and Brunei all claim parts of the sea.翻译:台湾、马来西亚、越南和文莱都对部分海域拥有主权。

The PCG's report comes several days after the Philippines carried out joint air and sea patrols with the United States, which was followed by a similar undertaking with Australia in the South China Sea, fanning tension with Beijing.翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队的报告发布几天前，菲律宾与美国进行了联合空中和海上巡逻，随后又与澳大利亚在南中国海进行了类似的行动，加剧了与北京的紧张关系。

The Philippines is ramping up efforts to counter what it describes as China's "aggressive activities" in the South China Sea, which has also become a naval flashpoint for Chinese and U.S. tension.翻译:菲律宾正在加大力度反击其所称的中国在南海的“侵略活动”，南海也已成为中美紧张关系的海军热点。

China has accused the Philippines of enlisting "foreign forces" to patrol the South China Sea and stirring up trouble. Manila insists its maritime activities are within its rights.翻译:中国指责菲律宾招募“外国势力”在南海巡逻并煽动事端。马尼拉坚称其海上活动属于其权利范围。

Reporting by Karen Lema; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:凯伦·莱玛报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 前官员称中国有更大空间降准而非降息
item.description:
China is likely to implement proactive fiscal policy next year as there is still a need for the world's second-biggest economy to realise stable growth, a former central banker was cited as saying in state-owned media on Sunday.翻译:官方媒体周日援引一位前央行行长的话说，中国明年可能会实施积极的财政政策，因为世界第二大经济体仍然需要实现稳定增长。

The comment comes as the economy struggles for momentum after being hobbled by lengthy pandemic-busting measures, while market watchers fear severe debt woe among major property developers could spill over to other sectors.翻译:这一言论发表之际，经济在受到长期抗疫措施的阻碍后正在努力寻找动力，而市场观察人士担心主要房地产开发商的严重债务困境可能会蔓延到其他行业。

"It is expected that next year China will continue to implement positive fiscal policy, monetary policies that are in line with positive fiscal policy, with a relatively large policy space to lower the reserve requirement ratio," Sheng Songcheng, a former statistics and analysis director of the People's Bank of China, said in comments reported by Shanghai Securities News.翻译:“预计明年中国将继续实施积极的财政政策、与积极财政政策相一致的货币政策，降低存款准备金率有较大的政策空间。”原统计分析部主任盛松成说。中国人民银行行长在上海证券报报道的评论中表示。

With interest rates and loan prime rates at low levels, there is more space to cut banks' reserve requirement ratio (RRR) than to cut interest rates, Sheng said.翻译:盛表示，在利率和贷款优惠利率处于较低水平的情况下，降低银行存款准备金率（RRR）的空间比降息的空间更大。

The central bank lowered the RRR in September for the second time this year to boost liquidity and support economic recovery. Analysts expect another cut by year-end.翻译:9月份央行今年第二次下调存款准备金率，以增加流动性并支持经济复苏。分析师预计年底前将再次降息。

The weighted average RRR for financial institutions was around 7.4% after the cut.翻译:降准后金融机构加权平均存款准备金率在7.4%左右。

China is prudent in cutting interest rates as its monetary policy needs to consider internal and external balance, Sheng said.翻译:盛表示，中国的降息是审慎的，因为货币政策需要考虑内外平衡。

"It is expected that the interest rate differential between China and the U.S. will enter a period of stabilisation, so the renminbi (yuan) is likely to maintain a mild appreciation trend, but the appreciation is limited."翻译:“预计中美利差将进入稳定期，因此人民币可能会保持温和升值趋势，但升值幅度有限。”

Reporting by Mei Mei Chu; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:朱梅梅报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 白俄罗斯总统卢卡申科今年第二次访华
item.description:
Belarusian President Alexander Lukashenko was heading to Beijing on Sunday for talks with Chinese leader Xi Jinping, Belarusian state media reported, the second trip of the close ally of Russian President Vladimir Putin to China this year.翻译:据白俄罗斯官方媒体报道，白俄罗斯总统亚历山大·卢卡申科将于周日前往北京与中国领导人习近平举行会谈，这是俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔·普京的亲密盟友今年第二次访华。

Lukashenko, who according to Chinese state media was welcomed with a gun salute and military honours during his official Feb. 28 - March 2 visit, was this time heading for "a working visit," BelTA state news agency reported.翻译:据白通社报道，据中国官方媒体报道，卢卡申科在2月28日至3月2日的正式访问期间受到礼炮和军事荣誉的欢迎，这次他是进行“工作访问”。

"Negotiations between the head of the Belarusian state and president of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping will take place in Beijing," BelTA said, citing Lukashenko's press service.翻译:白俄罗斯通讯社援引卢卡申科新闻部门的话说：“白俄罗斯国家元首和中华人民共和国主席习近平之间的谈判将在北京举行。”

"The agenda includes issues of trade, economic, investment and international cooperation."翻译:“议程包括贸易、经济、投资和国际合作问题。”

After their first talks this year, Xi said that the China-Belarus "friendship is unbreakable, and the two sides should constantly enhance political mutual trust and remain each other's true friends and good partners."翻译:今年首次会谈后，习近平表示，中白友谊牢不可破，双方要不断增强政治互信，做彼此的真朋友、好伙伴。

Lukashenko, the president of Belarus since 1994 who has been shunned by the West, backed Russia's invasion in Ukraine in February 2022 by allowing Moscow to use its territory to launch the war.翻译:自 1994 年起担任白俄罗斯总统的卢卡申科一直受到西方国家的回避，他支持俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵乌克兰，允许莫斯科利用乌克兰领土发动战争。

China maintains close ties to Russia and has never condemned its invasion of Ukraine, but Beijing became vocal earlier this year in calling for peace as the Ukraine conflict drags on.翻译:中国与俄罗斯保持着密切关系，从未谴责其入侵乌克兰，但随着乌克兰冲突的持续，北京今年早些时候开始直言不讳地呼吁和平。

After their March 1 meeting, both Lukashenko and Xi called for the "soonest possible" peace deal for Ukraine. But the war, now in its 22nd month, has no end in sight, with neither side willing to compromise to negotiate.翻译:3月1日会面后，卢卡申科和习近平都呼吁“尽快”达成乌克兰和平协议。但战争已经进入第22个月，还看不到结束的迹象，双方都不愿意在谈判中妥协。

(This story has been refiled to correct the date to Feb. 28 in paragraph 2)翻译:（这篇报道已重新归档，将第 2 段中的日期更正为 2 月 28 日）
